summary: Datadog Go integration is using outdated v1.58.1. This feature request asks to update it to the latest v2.5.0 to leverage current functionality and improvements.
userImpact: Users cannot benefit from new Datadog v2.x features and improvements in their Temporal Go SDK applications.
proposedFix: Update the Datadog Go integration dependency from v1.58.1 to v2.5.0
keyQuote: the current datadog implementation is using an old version 1.58.1, and current datadog go sdk version is 2.5.0
